description: This file defines a Flutter widget named SearchBarField which provides a search bar UI component, including a TextField for input and a search button, with styling support from a custom theme.

classes.name: SearchBarField
classes.description: A stateless widget that displays a search input box with a search icon button, allowing the user to input search queries and trigger a search callback.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the search bar, including a text input and a styled search button.
